Trade/Device Name(s): FORA GD43 Blood Glucose Monitoring System
Methodologies: Measurement of electrical current generated by reaction of glucose with reagent
Document Summary: FDA 510(k) summary for FORA GD43 Blood Glucose Monitoring System for quantitative glucose measurement in fresh capillary whole blood using electrochemical technology
Indications for Use Summary: Intended for quantitative measurement of glucose in fresh capillary whole blood from fingertip and alternative sites for self-testing by people with diabetes at home as an aid to monitor effectiveness of diabetes control; not for diagnosis, screening, or use on neonates
